description: Try our easy to follow Colourful Xmas Tree Choc Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Colourful Xmas Tree Choc Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C fan forced. Grease and line base and sides of 30x20cm slice tin.
Combine butter, milk chocolate melts, sugar and 100 mls of the sweetened condensed milk in a saucepan. Stir over a low heat until melted and smooth and set aside to cool for 10 minutes.
Once cooled, add beaten eggs, sifted plain flour and 100% cocoa into saucepan and combine until smooth.

Pour mixture into the lined cake tin and bake 35-40 minutes or until just firm to touch. Cool in pan. Turn out on the chopping board and cut in to 3 by 5 squares, cut each square diagonally in half to form triangles.

In separate saucepan place the remainder sweetened condensed milk, and pack of white chocolate melts and stir until melted and smooth. Add 3-4 drops of fool colouring to make the mixture a light green colour and cool for 5 minutes.
Fill a piping bag with the green chocolate mixture and pip over triangles. Decorate with mini smarties. Arrange triangles into Christmas trees on plate to serve
